mapper.sql: t.id, t.batch_id, t.temp_pv, t.temp_sp, t.temp_min, t.temp_max, t.temps_title t.other_temps_value t.temps_sp t.temps_min t.temps_max t.gass_pv t.gass_sp t.step, t.remarks, t.create_by, t.create_date, t.update_by, t.update_date, t.del_flag
mapper.select: select t.id, t.batch_id, t.temp_pv, t.temp_sp, t.temp_min, t.temp_max, t.temps_title, t.other_temps_value, t.temps_sp, t.temps_min, t.temps_max, t.gass_pv, t.gass_sp, t.step, t.remarks, t.create_by, t.create_date, t.update_by, t.update_date, t.del_flag from ovn_batch_lot r left join ovn_batch_lot_param t on t.batch_id = r.id where r.eqp_id = #{eqpId} and ( (r.end_time > #{beginTime} AND r.end_time < #{endTime}) OR (r.start_time > #{beginTime} AND r.start_time < #{endTime}) ) and t.create_date between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} order by t.create_date, t.batch_id
